result.execSummary:
The defendant Karen A Miszewski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/ Intent/Deliver Narcotics, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Court costs and DNA surcharge to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Submit to an AODA  Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended.

Maintain absolute sobriety.
Submit to random alcohol/drug screens.
Not to use or possess of alcohol or controlled substances without a valid prescription or any drug paraphernalia.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended.
No contact with co-defendants.
Provide DNA sample if not already provided.

timeConds.notes: Condition Time - STAYED - to be used at Agent's discretion, as well as to the huber or straight time.

Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Karen A Miszewski in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  

State presented their sentencing recommendations.
Defense presented their sentencing recommendations.



Court orders the following:
12  Months in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
STAYED.

Term of Probation:  2 Years.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
No Use or Possession of alcohol, controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
No contact with:  Co-Defendants.
DNA sample to be provided.

Costs:  $268
DNA SURCHARGE:  $ 250
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid as a Condition of Probation.

CONDITION TIME: 
30 Days in the Waukesha County Jail.
STAYED - To be used at agent's discretion.  
Agent to determine with or without non working hours.
